title: How do I stop the screen from waking easily when in battery saver mode?
content: When the phone is locked in battery saver mode the lock screen comes on (phone wakes up) very easily. On my old pixel I would have to press the lock button to wake the phone when in battery saver. I can't find anywhere in the settings to make it like this.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
